author: rbowen
msg: "misspelled" has been "mis-spelled" for quite long enough.

author: hrabago
msg: Added extends attribute to form-bean, exception, forward, and action elements.
Remove #REQUIRED for attributes that can be inherited.  Checking for these values were moved to the initialization of ModuleConfig (currently in ActionServlet).

author: hrabago
msg: Add support for configuration inheritance for form beans, actions, exception, and forwards.
Added methods in ActionServlet to process extensions for form beans, actions, exception, and forwards while initializing module.
Add processExtends() and checkCircularInheritance() method for processing configuration extension for each config object.
Add inheritFrom() methods that custom config subclasses can override to support inheritance for custom properties.

author: slive
msg: Add some stuff back to httpd-std.conf.in in the manual
section to deal with language negotiation.
